data.subject: Re: Trying to be Asian in America
data.content:
At Depend on my views, culture and cultural difference in America of Asia rather big, this mother hopes to preserve Asia cultural proper traditional culture, but the difference of opinion of probably  they viewpoint,they to cultural preservation or not keep different viewpoint, then discuss, finally they in peaceful way end this time of confabulation2010-09-20 18:15:50 greg (高來圭 ) wrote :

Why did she want to bring up her daugher in the Vietnam way in the US?

Did she think Vietnamese practices better than American ones?

Why did she feel she had been too hard on her daughter?

Does  she now think American practices are better?

I don't know if she is good at intercultural communication or not.

What do you think?
